tool_description:
This API provides users with access to the latest version of ChatGPT, a cutting-edge language model trained by OpenAI. This means that users can take advantage of the most advanced natural language processing capabilities available, allowing for more accurate and effective communication with users or customers.

One of the key advantages of this API is its speed and reliability. ChatGPT is known for its fast response times and the ability to handle large volumes of requests without experienci...
name: ChatGPT Ai Chat bot
title: ChatGPT Ai Chat bot

api_list.name: Ask
api_list.description:
1. To start a new chat or get a one-time response, send a POST request to the /ask endpoint with a JSON object that includes a query property containing the text of the message you want to send:

```
{
   "query" : "How are you?",
   "wordLimit":"256" (optional)
}
```

2. To get a response based on previous chats, send a POST request to the /ask endpoint with a JSON object that includes both a query property containing the text of the message you want to send and a conversationId property containing the ID of the conversation you want to retrieve the response for:

```
{
   "query" : "How are you?",
   "conversationId": "<Id from 1st response>"
}
```

![](https://gcdnb.pbrd.co/images/AKTgGLcyFyWv.png)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://chatgpt-ai-chat-bot.p.rapidapi.com/ask"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "chatgpt-ai-chat-bot.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://chatgpt-ai-chat-bot.p.rapidapi.com/ask"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "chatgpt-ai-chat-bot.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
